alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 12 at 3:06PM MDT until October 13 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Locally higher amounts in excess of 6 inches are possible on exposed ridge tops. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Higher elevations along the Pine Ridge in Converse and Niobrara counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick or snow covered roadways and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County
